com.ibm.lpex.java
Class JavaParser

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.ibm.lpex.core.LpexCommonParser
        |
        +--com.ibm.lpex.java.JavaParser
Direct Known Subclasses:
JavaSqlParser
public class JavaParser
extends LpexCommonParser

Java parser for JavaLPEX.

Actions (and assigned keys) added by this parser: methods (Ctrl+G), outline, errors for selective views of the document: methods, a logical outline, errors; doc to generate a class/method javadoc comment-block template; and trace to insert tracing statements for a method.
Actions modified by this parser: split, join, delete for handling javadoc comment-blocks editing.
Actions redefined by LpexCommonParser and further modified by this parser: openLine, splitLine for handling javadoc comment-block editing.

Constructor Detail

JavaParser

public JavaParser(LpexView lpexView)
Constructor for the parser. Adds all of the parser specifics to the Lpex view. Initializes the Lpex view for the parser: it sets up all the style attributes, classes, etc. for the language-sensitive edit features supported.
Parameters:
lpexView - the LPEX document view associated with this parser.

Parameters:

getProperty

public java.lang.String getProperty(java.lang.String key)
Expand LpexCommonParser's getProperty() to substitute arguments for key PROTOKEY_EMPTY. Argument {0} is the package name, {1} is the class name. The substitutions are based on the name parameter of the document.
Overrides:
getProperty in class LpexCommonParser
Tags copied from class: LpexCommonParser
Parameters:
key - property name, e.g., "proto.doc" for the expansion of keyword "doc" with the proto action
See Also:
LpexCommonParser.getLanguage(), LpexCommonParser.getProfile()

getSqlLexer

public SqlLexer getSqlLexer(LpexCharStream stream)
Retrieve the SqlLexer. The parser extending JavaParser to support embedded SQL statements must override this method to construct and return an SqlLexer object. The implementation of this method provided by the JavaParser class does nothing, except return null.
Parameters:
stream - input character stream for the SQL lexer
